channel.title: Need help on how to make my server online!
channel.description: someone please help me to make my server online. when i try to put it onto moparscape server status list it says "server offline server must be online to post". plz helP!!

item.title: Need help on how to make my server online!
item.dc:creator: @Play_N_Skillz Play N Skillz
item.description:
@Play_N_Skillz wrote:

Wow, now why didn’t I think of that…? That’s basically what they all do… Get on your server, summon about a million times or use that bloody cat! Or one of my worsts are the ones who just constantly use yelling commands “dissing” the server owner in graphic language.

Thanks alot for the tip, I’m sure you helped me and J bird out (who i apologize to for coming in on this thread). Props to you!

Read full topic
item.source: Need help on how to make my server online!

item.title: Need help on how to make my server online!
item.dc:creator: @I_Br3ndan_I I Br3ndan I
item.description:
@I_Br3ndan_I wrote:

Honestly people. I seriously advise not using the Server Status.

Why? : Because that’s where all the newbie’s go. Go ahead, think nothing of it. They all mass, crash and basically kick the shit out of your server.

They don’t have a clue about MoparScape, if you post here on the forums, you’ll get less rule breakers etc as they are more aware of the general rules etc. Plus they are more respective, reliable and will give you the recognition you deserve.

Just a suggestion.

Read full topic
item.source: Need help on how to make my server online!

item.title: Need help on how to make my server online!
item.dc:creator: @Play_N_Skillz Play N Skillz
item.description:
@Play_N_Skillz wrote:

Err , I clicked this post hoping to find an answer because mine is doing the exact same thing… But I really don’t feel like going back previous 800+ pages to find it out either

Someone… Please help the both of us.
I’ve got it up, port forwarded, got my no-ip up and got it on the blushed smiley face connecting… but it always says its “OFFLINE”…

Read full topic
